PageInfo.Message:
By gaining experience in your job, you can level
up and earn <COL ffdc78>Job Points </COL>(JP).
You can use Job Points to acquire new <COL
ffdc78>skills</COL> and <COL
ffdc78>abilities</COL> corresponding to your
level.

New skills and abilities can be learned and
equipped by consulting with Archibald at the
temple and the <COL ffdc78>Arts Support</COL> at
each Portcrystal, and paying Job Points.
When you level up, it would be a good idea to go
and see if there are any new techniques that you
can use.

You can obtain skills and abilities by selecting
the green icon labeled <COL ffdc78>【GET】</COL>
displayed.
Choose the skill you want to acquire and pay the
Job Points shown below.
<COL ffdc78>Once you have acquired a skill, you
can allocate it to the "Custom Skill Set" frame on
the right side by selecting the skill icon and
using the corresponding button. This will allow
you to use the skill in combat.</COL>

The acquired <COL ffdc78>augments</COL> each have
a specific <COL ffdc78>Ability Cost</COL>
required.
As long as it is within the cost limit, you can
freely attach augments regardless of the job.
The way you battle can greatly vary depending on
your skills and augments, so please give them a
try.

Furthermore, by selecting <COL ffdc78>[LV
UP]</COL> and pouring job points into it, it is
possible to further strengthen the skills and
abilities that have been acquired.
Depending on the skill, there may be an increase
in power, a decrease in cost, or a change in
motion.
For abilities as well, the effects will improve,
so let's make use of leveling up our combat
techniques.

If you feel that your current job is unsuitable,
you can consult Archibald and immediately switch
to another job through a <COL ffdc78>Change
Vocation</COL>.
Let's find a combat style that suits you.
